mini Giotto object for spatial single-cell 3D data

Source: R/data.R
mini_giotto_3D.Rd

Mini Giotto object created from the STARmap data.

data(mini_giotto_3D)

Format

An object of class "giotto"; see createGiottoObject.

References

Wang et al. (2018) Science (PubMed)

Examples

data(mini_giotto_3D)

if (FALSE) spatPlot3D(mini_giotto_3D, cell_color = 'cell_types', point_size = 5)

Contents

Developed by Ruben Dries, Jiaji George Chen, Natalie Del Rossi, Emma Kelley, Junxiang Xu, Guo-Cheng Yuan.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
